Nissan x Japan

Collaboration Proposal

Oh hey Nissan.
Let's cruise around Japan together and make some magic.

We've got a vision.


We're a group of content creators heading on a press trip to Japan to explore an off-the-beaten path itinerary -- together we can turn it into an epic road trip.


For one week in March 2019, we would cruise around Japan in a Nissan car capturing photo & video content for your social media as well as promoting Nissan to our audiences.

Our crew

We're a group of content creators and influencers who take incredible pride in creating content for brands that tells a story. We have adventure photographer Jess Bonde ( @wildbonde ), travel and lifestyle photographer Emilio ( @eyesofanomad ), professional model and influencer Rachel Bowler ( @rachelbowler_ ) and micro-influencer Tina May ( @hellotinamay ).

We collectively have experience working with hundreds of companies from all over the world showcasing their brand personality. We'll be travelling with a full professional setup -- Canon 5D Mk IV, Panasonic GH5, Mavic Pro 2 Drone, etc -- ready to create high resolution content for your brand.

The experience you need

We've worked car companies, local and international fashion & lifestyle brands, luxury villas and hotels, cafes and restaurants, tour companies and more. Our work has been featured by BBC, NYtimes, CNN, Discovery and is re-shared by major instagram accounts like @artofvisuals and @moodygrams on a regular basis.

From the streets of Tokyo to the slopes of Mt Fuji, we want to see it all in a Nissan rental car.

Our Pitch

We'll be exploring Japan for 1 week starting the 13th March and would love to do it in as a road trip. In exchange for providing a rental car for 1 week + fuel costs we could offer ...

  • 15x high resolution professionally edited photos
  • 1x 30 second video promotional video of the road trip
  • Mention in a minimum of 6 separate instagram stories on each persons instagram account (total 24 stories)
  • 2 dedicated instagram posts tagging @Nissan on each persons instagram account (total 8 posts)

Slide into my inbox

Keen to chat further? Send me an email and let's get the ball rolling.
